title: Strengthening Hospitality Practice Competencies: Multicultural Understanding and Nationalism Development: Blended Learning-Based Elementary Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of sociocultural phenomena and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can explain the positive/negative impacts of nationalism by analyzing diverse cultural case studies
Learners can create multicultural understanding discussion materials using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet) in blended learning environments
By the end of instruction, over 80% of students demonstrate at least 20% improvement in cultural literacy assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
